Package net.chaossquad.mclib.actionbar.playerinfo

Klasse PlayerInfoActionbar

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.actionbar.playerinfo.PlayerInfoActionbar
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
TaskRunnable
public final class PlayerInfoActionbar extends Object implements TaskRunnable
An actionbar which shows the current player name and health in the actionbar.
